hanzi-su-wiki:
費

Значения

Использовать, тратить, транжирить; быть истраченным

Мнемоника

Тратить деньги 貝, сопротивляясь 弗 желанию купить больше.

Варианты

费

jp_example_words:
経費(けいひ): expenses, cost, outlay

実費(じっぴ): actual expense, cost price
出費(しゅっぴ): expenses, disbursements
費やす(ついやす): to spend, to devote, to waste
費(ひ): cost, expense
浪費(ろうひ): waste, extravagance
消費(しょうひ): consumption, expenditure
費用(ひよう): cost, expense
jp_readingExamples: 費える (つい.える), 費やす (つい.やす)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Dollars and shellfish are used to pay expenses and costs. Shellfish used to be used as currency, so they're like the coins that go with dollars.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine opening your bank account and looking at all of your monthly expenses. Now drag the little dollar and shellfish icons over to cover all of those costs.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: What is the biggest expense and cost? It's the heat (ひ) bill.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: When you see how expensive your heat is, you feel a heat going through your body too.
Ru_Radicals: ｜, ハ, 弓 (лук), 目 (глаз), 貝 (раковина)
Ru_trainchinese:

fèi: (глаг) тратить, расходовать, расточать
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the shellfish (貝) with dollars (弗) spends
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Whether American dollars or some other form of clams, expenses are expenses.
humanum_full_description_en:
Bronze inscription from " Bei ", " Fu " sound, Bronze inscription is used as a person's name. In eight years, Xincheng Dalingge: "Gong 帀 (teacher) Song fee", the original meaning is to spend money. "Shuowen": "Fee is used to disperse money. From Bever's voice." "Xunzi·Yibing": "If it is Rongjia Yuzhong, support must be paid."

" Fees " can mean expenses. "Zhuangzi‧ Geng Sangchu": "Those who are committed to a period of time, only Jia people are also." Chen Guying quoted Yu Yue as saying: "For those who are interested in a period of time, it is extremely costly. Expenses are also used for money."

" Fees " can also mean depletion. Song Wang Anshi (Han Zi): "Strong to speak out and exaggerate the vulgar, poor spirits without repayment."
humanum_short_description_en: Inscriptions from " Bei " and " Fu " sound, the original meaning is to consume money.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「貝」，「弗」聲，金文用作人名，八年新城大令戈：「工帀（師）宋費」，本義是耗用錢財。《說文》：「費，散財用也。从貝弗聲。」《荀子‧議兵》：「若是則戎甲俞眾，奉養必費。」

　　「費」可表示費用。《莊子‧庚桑楚》：「志乎期費者，唯賈人也。」陳鼓應注引俞樾曰：「期費者，極費也。費謂財用也。」

　　「費」也可表示耗損。宋王安石〈韓子〉：「力去陳言誇末俗，可憐無補費精神。」
humanum_short_description: 金文從「貝」，「弗」聲，本義是耗用錢財。

金文從「 貝 」，「 弗 」聲，金文用作人名，八年新城大令戈：「工帀（師）宋費」，本義是耗用錢財。《說文》：「費，散財用也。从貝弗聲。」《荀子‧議兵》：「若是則戎甲俞眾，奉養必費。」 「 費 」可表示費用。《莊子‧庚桑楚》：「志乎期費者，唯賈人也。」陳鼓應注引俞樾曰：「期費者，極費也。費謂財用也。」 「 費 」也可表示耗損。宋王安石〈韓子〉：「力去陳言誇末俗，可憐無補費精神。」
Bronze inscription from " Bei", " Fu" sound, Bronze inscription is used as a person's name. In eight years, Xincheng Dalingge: "Gong 帀 (teacher) Song fee", the original meaning is to spend money. "Shuowen": "Fee is used to disperse money. From Bever's voice." "Xunzi·Yibing": "If it is Rongjia Yuzhong, support must be paid." " Fees" can mean expenses. "Zhuangzi‧ Geng Sangchu": "Those who are committed to a period of time, only Jia people are also." Chen Guying quoted Yu Yue as saying: "For those who are interested in a period of time, it is extremely costly. Expenses are also used for money." " Fees" can also mean depletion. Song Wang Anshi (Han Zi): "Strong to speak out and exaggerate the vulgar, poor spirits without repayment."

費字的基本解释

費
fèi
见“费”。

費字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fèi］
［《廣韻》芳未切，去未，敷。］
“费1”的繁体字。
(1)用财多；靡费。
(2)花费，耗费。
(3)财用，费用。
(4)言辞繁琐多馀。
(5)烦劳。
(6)光耀，光亮。
(7)引申为显著。
(8)暗昧不明。
(9)古地名。春秋鲁大夫费庈父食邑。在今山东省鱼台县西南费亭。
(10)姓。夏桀时有费昌。见《史记·秦本纪》。
[②]［fú］
［《集韻》分物切，入物，非。］
“费2”的繁体字。
违背，不顺利。
[③]［bì］
［《廣韻》兵媚切，去至，幫。］
“费3”的繁体字。
古地名。春秋鲁邑，在今山东省费县西北。

費字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【貝字部】　費； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1207第04
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?芳未切，音沸。【說文】散財用也。【註】徐曰：財散出如湯沸然。【論語】君子惠而不費。【何晏註】無費於財。　又【玉篇】損也，耗也。【禮·曲禮】不辭費。【韓詩外傳】不爲公費乎。　又【玉篇】用也。【史記·聶政傳】故進百金者，將用爲夫人麤糲之費。　又【廣韻】惠也。　又【集韻】分物切，音弗。【禮·中庸】君子之道，費而隱。【鄭註】費，猶佹也。【釋文】本又作拂。【朱傳】費，用之廣也。音符味反。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【正韻】?兵媚切，音秘。邑名，在魯。同鄪。【書·費誓傳】費，魯東郊之地名。　又【集韻】父沸切，音屝。姓也。【急就篇註】費氏，楚大夫費無極之後。漢有費直。

費字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
費字的起名意思

暂无。

(1) Use a lot of money; extravagant expenses.
(2) Expenditure.
(3) Finance and expenses.
(4) The language is cumbersome and redundant.
(5) Annoying.
(6) Shining, shining.
(7) The extension is significant.
(8) Darkness is unknown.
(9) Ancient place names. In the Spring and Autumn Period, Dr. Lu Fei Yufu Shiyi. In today's Feiting, southwest of Yutai County, Shandong Province.
(10) Last name. There was Fei Chang in Xia Jie. See "Historical Records · Qin Benji".

Name meaning

fèi
вм. 费
Radicals: 弗, 貝  (dollar, shellfish)
Meaning Mnemonic
Dollars and shellfish are used to pay expenses and costs. Shellfish used to be used as currency, so they're like the coins that go with dollars.
Imagine opening your bank account and looking at all of your monthly expenses. Now drag the little dollar and shellfish icons over to cover all of those costs.
Reading Mnemonic
What is the biggest expense and cost? It's the heat (ひ) bill.
When you see how expensive your heat is, you feel a heat going through your body too.
